problem.title: Insertion Sort
problem.description: Implement insertion sort algorithm to sort an array of integers in ascending order. Insertion sort is a simple sorting algorithm that builds the final sorted array one item at a time.

solutions.title: Solution 1 – Insertion Sort Implementation
solutions.description: Implement insertion sort by building the final sorted array one item at a time.

complexity.time: O(n²) worst and average case, O(n) best case
